Content.Text:
<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aah, why must all of my flowers be so
gorgeous?
<PAGE>
It's as if they compete in silent ardor to be the
first to unveil their beauty before me.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>But therein lies the problem. I am surrounded by
that which eclipses my own beauty!
<PAGE>
I raised these flowers to be a joy to me, and now
I am daily pricked as though each bore the rose's
thorns. Alas!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh. It's you.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R><FACE_SAD>My apologies. I was lost in thought... Urgh...and
now I don't feel so well...

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>In fact, I'm starting to feel rather dizzy... Would
you please...call...a doctor...?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Marvelous, you're awake. How do you feel?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Mmh...? I...I remember admiring my flowers,
letting my thoughts wander. Then, I was beset
by a spell of dizziness...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was just a mild case of anemia, honey.
Nothing to get too worked up about.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that we know your body is healthy, what
about the rest of you? You were mumbling in
your sleep. Is something bothering you?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aaaaa, your silence tells me there is! Just as I
thought. Out with it, now! You can bare the
cares of your heart to me.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
No, this...is my burden. I don't believe either of
you could understand.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh come on, honey. Are we not comrades of
the "Beautiful Dreamer Alliance?" No matter how
scandalous the issue, I'll gladly hear you out!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
A beautiful dream... Well then, let me ask you...
<PAGE>
Which is more beautiful, me, or my flowers?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wait...is that what you've been worried about?
To the point of sickness? Ugh, I can hardly
believe you. Sheesh!
<PAGE>
What do you think, <MYNAME>?
You are prettier.
The flowers are prettier.
You can't compare them.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>Thank you, dear <MYNAME>, but you needn't
resort to such obvious flattery.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>No matter what I do, I could never compare to
their beauty.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>Such forthright honesty, <MYNAME>. If you--a
simple observer--say so, it must be true.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>No matter what I do, I could never compare to
their beauty.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, see? <MYNAME> has the right idea. It's
silly to compare yourself with a flower.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>Are you so sure? Beauty is not the sole province
of mankind. What is my smile to a blossom
clothed in the diamonds of a morning's dew...?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_ANGER_R>Are you listening to a word I say? Helloooo! Pay
attention here!
<PAGE>
Sure, flowers are beautiful. But their outer
beauty is all they've got. Your beauty, though?
Outside AND inside. You've got layers!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ha ha...spoken like a true doctor. All right,
you've convinced me.
<PAGE>
But I want to keep a strong focus on that
external beauty. I'm sure you understand why.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Of course, honey, I know just how you feel. But
that's no reason to fret. You need to have more
confidence in your own loveliness, okay?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>Ah, confidence, a wily mark if ever there were! I
can hardly believe I lost sight of mine so easily.
<PAGE>
After all, what in this world could be more
beautiful than I?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good, good. From the look of things, you're well
on your way to a full recovery. I prescribe plenty
of rest and lingering gazes into the mirror.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, shall we be going?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. Truly, you have saved
me.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, <MYNAME>. Spit it out!
